import React from'react';import'./Signup.css';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import useUserData from'../useUserData';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Signup(){const navigate=useNavigate();const{name,phone_num,id,password,setName,setPhone_num,setId,setPassword,handleSave,fetchUserData}=useUserData();const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();if(name&&phone_num&&id&&password){const signupData={name,phone_num,id,password};try{// 회원가입 시 입력한 정보 전달 경로
const response=await axios.post('/loginpage/process/signup',signupData);const result=response.data;if(result.success){alert('회원가입 성공!');navigate('/loginpage');}else{alert(result.message);}}catch(error){console.error('회원가입 요청 중 오류 발생:',error);alert('회원가입 요청 중 오류가 발생했습니다.');}}else{alert('필수 정보를 입력해주세요.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"SignupPage",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD68C\uC6D0\uAC00\uC785"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"SignupContent",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"signupTextbox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uC774\uB984 *"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uC5F0\uB77D\uCC98 *"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"- \uC81C\uC678\uD558\uACE0 \uC785\uB825 (ex. 01012345678)",value:phone_num,onChange:e=>setPhone_num(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uC544\uC774\uB514 *"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"\uD559\uBC88 10\uC790\uB9AC\uB97C \uC785\uB825\uD574\uC8FC\uC138\uC694.",value:id,onChange:e=>setId(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uBE44\uBC00\uBC88\uD638 *"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"btnContent",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"signupBtn",children:"\uD68C\uC6D0\uAC00\uC785"})})]})]});}export default Signup;
